coreAttributes.name: taur-trousers
coreAttributes.description: A set of specially-designed trousers, suitable to be fit onto the lower body of any taur race. A very weak telekinetic enchantment helps the wearer put them on without assistance. There is a zip running down beneath the rear portion, allowing the wearer to do their business without taking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc.her] head, before allowing the weak telekinetic enchantment to zip them up beneath [npc.her] [npc.legRace]'s body.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc2.namePos] head, before zipping them up beneath [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] the unzipped taur-trousers down over [npc2.namePos] head, before roughly zipping them up beneath [npc2.her] [npc2.legRace]'s body.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] focuses [npc.her] thoughts on unzipping [npc.her] taur-trousers, and, sure enough, the weak telekinetic enchantment sets to work, soon allowing [npc.herHim] to take them off by pulling them up and over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] taur-trousers, before pulling them up and over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] taur-trousers, before yanking them up and over [npc2.her] head.
